dimension.label: Chain dimension:
dimension.description: The order of the markov chain used. Higher values mean less random texts.

language.label: Language:
language.description: Language used by the spell-checking (only GNU Aspell language codes are valid).

length.label: Tweet length:
length.description: Maximum length of generated tweets (in tokens).

max.label: Maximum tweets:
max.description: Maximum number of tweets to be generated (0=infinite).

result.field.label: Result field:
result.field.description: Field name to save twets to.

sleep.description: Optional sleeping time inbetween tweet generation (in ms).

sources.field.label: Save no. of sources to:
sources.field.description: Field name to save number of sources to.

spellcheck.label: Spell-checking
spellcheck.description: Spell-check the words used for tweet generation.
